mapper.select: select dm_no as dmNo, class_no as classNo, dm_receiver as dmReceiver, dm_sender as dmSender, dm_content as dmContent, dm_read_flag as dmReadFlag, dm_date as dmDate from dm where dm_no IN (select max(dm_no) from dm group by class_no) order by dm_read_flag asc, dm_date desc
select dm_no as dmNo, class_no as classNo, dm_receiver as dmReceiver, dm_sender as dmSender, dm_content as dmContent, dm_read_flag as dmReadFlag, dm_date as dmDate from dm where class_no=#{classNo}
